Along with solar sails and solar electric propulsion, ED tethers are one of the big concepts in replacing chemical thrust. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electrodynamic_tether

This would require a magnetosphere / ionosphere model, and enables trading off orbital velocity directly for power, contingent on the position and direction of the ship being conducive to traction against the planetary magnetic field.
The problem with this is that it would require some kind of magnetosphere implementation, which has to potential to complicate things a whole lot
